name: German Volume Training (10×10) — ~20 min per exercise
overview_and_execution: Perform 10 sets of 10 reps with a ~60% 1RM load. Rest ~60–90s between sets. Increase the load once all 10 sets are completed successfully.
example_application: Bench Press 10×10 @ 135 lb, 60s rest. Progress by 5 lb increments if all reps are achieved.
important_notes: Highly taxing approach. Typically do just one GVT exercise per muscle group. Deload after ~4-6 weeks to avoid overtraining.
